enWisdom: The comfort of life is in security
There is no blessing better than security

Wisdom: شَرُّ الْبِلَادِ بَلَدٌ لَا أَمْنَ فِيهِ وَلَا خِصْبَ
enWisdom: The worst of countries is the country in which there is neither peace nor productivity

Wisdom: شَرُّ الْأَوْطَانِ مَا لَمْ يَأْمَنْ فِيهِ الْقُطَّانُ
enWisdom: The worst homelands are those in which the inhabitants are not safe

Wisdom: حَلَاوَةُ الْأَمْنِ تُنَكِّدُهَا مَرَارَةُ الْخَوْفِ وَالْحَذَرِ
enWisdom: The sweetness of security is spoilt by the bitterness of fear and panic

Wisdom: رُبَّ أَمْنٍ انْقَلَبَ خَوْفاً [رُبَّ حَرْفٍ انْقَلَبَ خَوْفاً]
enWisdom: Many a security turns into fear
The fearful one has no life
Sometimes you may be attacked from within your sanctuary

Wisdom: أُنْسُ الْأَمْنِ تُذْهِبُهُ وَحْشَةُ الْوَحْدَةِ وَأُنْسُ الْجَمَاعَةِ يُنَكِّدُهُ وَحْشَةُ الْمَخَافَةِ
enWisdom: The comfort of security is removed by the anxiety of loneliness and the apprehension of fear disturbs the familiarity of society
